entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Microsoft.UI.Xaml v2.8.0

https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.UI.Xaml/2.8.0

  • WebView2 is now available in WinUI 2. WebView2 enables you to embed web content in native applications with Microsoft Edge (Chromium).
  • The minimum supported version of WinUI 2 is now Windows 10, version 1809 - build 17763.
  • Several bug fixes and improvements for a range of controls including TabView, NavigationView InfoBadge and ProgressRing.
  • Improvements to accessibility and high contrast mode.
  • AnimatedVisualPlayer.AnimationOptimization property to configure how animations are cached in an AnimatedVisualPlayer.

Changes:

  • 17bf1fc update PhoneProductId (#7379)
  • 631a7ae add section 1.3 (#7370)
  • 644e5b7 Update all usage of Newtonsoft.Json to 13.0.1 (#7363)
  • 7ed0bcf Add 1.1.2 tag to bug report (#7320)
  • 0ce9be8 Sync WebView2 code with WinUI 3 (#7351)
  • f62362d Update PhoneId in MUX Framework Package appxmanifest (#7353)
  • eb0f8ef Fix WebView2 accessibility crash in ProviderWrapper::GetRuntimeId (#7345)
  • b0a4412 Update WebView2 SDK to 1.0.1264.42 (#7329)
  • bace2c5 NavigationViewTemplateSettings.OpenPaneLength Update (#7341)
  • dffc761 WinUI Vpack: Include re-merged winmd (#7179)
See More
  • eaf0cba Delete Discussion and Question Issue templates (#7337)
